beer.beer_description: Our fruity Extra Pale Ale is the perfect summer drink. Mosaic and Enigma hops bring grassy, citrus and berry flavours. Combined with a hint of bitterness and a crisp finish, it’s the perfect refreshment on a balmy village day.

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 60 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 13! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description: Our fruity Extra Pale Ale is the perfect summer drink. Mosaic and Enigma hops bring grassy, citrus and berry flavours. Combined with a hint of bitterness and a crisp finish, it’s the perfect refreshment on a balmy village day.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 70 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 15!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 135 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 28.

beer.beer_description: Our fruity Extra Pale Ale is the perfect summer drink. Mosaic and Enigma hops bring grassy, citrus and berry flavours. Combined with a hint of bitterness and a crisp finish, it’s the perfect refreshment on a balmy village day.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 360 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 73.

items.checkin_comment: Bit more standard pale. Ok bit subdued on hops

beer.beer_description: Our fruity Extra Pale Ale is the perfect summer drink. Mosaic and Enigma hops bring grassy, citrus and berry flavours. Combined with a hint of bitterness and a crisp finish, it’s the perfect refreshment on a balmy village day.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 355 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 72!

items.checkin_comment: Wow. Crushable, bit of hops. Reminds me incredibly of balter tbh, in a good way

user.bio: Drinky drinky, time for less thinky.

user.bio: Work less, play more, drink better beer
I just enjoy drinking in foreign theme parks
